text: @Amy_Siskind Amy Acton of Ohio was criticized & harassed by demonstrators at her home, even after Gov DeWine said all the final decisions about COVID-19 closures & policy were up to him alone. She saved a lot of lives & calmed a worried state. As a result, Ohio fared better than other states.
